pr_title: Return remark in rdap response when abuse mailbox validation has failed.

timeline.message: Return remark in rdap response when abuse mailbox validation has failed.

timeline.bodyText: Mixing Nullable and Optional in the same method arguments? Can we choose one style for consistency?
timeline.author: eshryane

replies.bodyText: We use just the AbuseContact now.
replies.author: sbusk

timeline.author: eshryane
